normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Fight alongside Turbo Twirly, the turbo trusty!
description.1: Summons Turbo Twirly. If Held and unleashed, Kachina will summon and ride Turbo Twirly.
description.2: When unleashed, Kachina will gain 50 Nightsoul points and enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state.
description.5: Turbo Twirly's various actions consume Kachina's Nightsoul points, and this state will last until these points have been depleted.
description.8: Can exist independently or be ridden and operated by Kachina. When Turbo Twirly is present, Kachina's Elemental Skill, "Go, Go, Turbo Twirly!", will change to Mounting/Dismounting options.
9: When present independent of Kachina, it will hit the ground at intervals, dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo> based on Kachina's DEF that also has the Nightsoul attribute.

When Kachina is riding Turbor Twirly, she can control its fast movement, climb, and use Normal Attack to hit the ground, dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo> based on Kachina's DEF that also has the Nightsoul alignment.
description.11: Turbo Twirly will disappear once Kachina's Nightsoul's Blessing state ends, and it is considered a Geo Construct. 1 Turbo Twirly can exist on the field at any one time.
description.13: Turbo Twirly only looks like a top — it is, in fact, a drill that can break even the strongest rock open!

description.0: Striking the ground, Kachina deals <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo> based on her DEF and creates a Turbo Drill Field.
description.1: The Field will increase Turbo Twirly's attack AoE and its movement speed when Kachina is riding it.
description.3: If Kachina's own Turbo Twirly is present when this is used, Turbo Twirly will be summoned to her side.
description.5: Just as nervous performers like to imagine audience members as wooden puppets, Kachina imagines that her opponents are the loveliest of gemstone ores — the kind you'd be proud to bring home and hoard.

description.0: When nearby party members trigger a Nightsoul Burst, Kachina's <geo>Geo DMG Bonus</geo> increases by 20% for 10s.
Turbo Twirly's DMG is increased by 20% of Kachina's DEF.

passive3.name: Night Realm's Gift: Heart of Unity

description.0: After her Nightsoul points are depleted, Kachina can switch to consuming Phlogiston to maintain her Nightsoul's Blessing.
description.1: While in an area with Phlogiston Device(s) within Natlan, she can use Nightsoul Transmission: Kachina. When the active character is currently sprinting, climbing, in a movement mode caused by certain Talents, or at a certain height in the air, the following will trigger when switching to Kachina: Kachina will enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state and ride Turbo Twirly when taking the field while gaining XX Nightsoul points. Can enter Nightsoul Transmission once every 10s.
description.3: Additionally, Kachina will consume 90% less Stamina when riding Turbo Twirly while in Natlan.

description.0: When Kachina mounts or dismounts Turbo Twirly, she will absorb Elemental Shards created by Crystallize.
description.1: Additionally, when a party member picks up such a Shard, 3 Energy will be restored to Kachina. Energy can be restored this way once every 5s.

constellation2.name: Never Leave Home Without... Turbo Twirly

description.0: When Kachina uses "Time to Get Serious!", she will regain 16 Nightsoul points. If there is no Turbo Twirly belonging to her on the field, she will enter Nightsoul's Blessing and summon one.
Increases the Level of Go, Go Turbo Twirly! by 3.
When there are 1/2/3/4 (or more) opponents within the Turbo Drill Field created by "Time to Get Serious!", the active character within the field gains 8%/12%/16%/20% increased DEF.
Increases the Level of Time to Get Serious! by 3.
When your active character's shield is replaced or destroyed for any reason, Kachina will deal 200% of her DEF as <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
